name: XSLX Generator
description: Parses a sheet of an xlsx file provided a list of locators.

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: Optionally specify on which nodes to run and how many instances you want on each node.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of node handler, one of SingleNode, SomeNodes, AllNodes (leave empty for local execution)

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: The nodes to use for this node handler type

parameters.name: instances
parameters.description: The amount of instances per node of this handler type

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: The name of the file to read from.

parameters.name: sheet_name
parameters.description: The sheet of the file to read from.

parameters.name: value_name
parameters.description: The value name under which all columns will be added after all locators are parsed, starting with the last parsed column or data_start_col, whichever comes last, and ending with data_end_col, inclusively. Will overwrite locators of the same name.

parameters.name: locators
parameters.description: List of locators, which will map their names to their parsed contents.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name under which the content is to be saved.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The locator's type, usually one of tuktu.csv.locators.{Column, Row, CellRangeSplitter}.

parameters.name: flattened
parameters.description: If true, return a list containing the Map generated by the locators and the value name, otherwise return a list with a map which maps the resultName to that map.

parameters.name: data_start_col
parameters.description: The column from where to start populating value name, but not before all locators are parsed.

parameters.name: data_end_col
parameters.description: Each row is processed up until this column. Value name is populated with all values up to this end column inclusively, but not before all locators are parsed. Leave empty to always process full rows.

parameters.name: column
parameters.description: The reading process is stopped once a row with the following value is encountered in the given column. That row is not processed.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The reading process is stopped once a row with this value is encountered in the column given above. That row is not processed.
